==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=开|alt=𫔭-obsolete Singapore simp.,𨵑}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etyl}}
{{Han compound|門|一|廾|t1=door|t2=latch|t3=a pair of hands|ls=ic}} — a pair of hands opening a latched door. {{zh-l|*一}} and {{zh-l|*廾}} are combined into {{zh-l|*开}} since the seal script.

{{rfe|lang=zh}}

===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[open]]; to [[unlatch]]; to [[unfasten]]
#* {{zh-x|我 開 不{bu}到 這 扇 門。|I can't '''open''' the door.}}
#* {{zh-x|商店 開 到 八 點。|The shop '''opens''' till eight o'clock.}}
#* {{zh-x|開 間 燒臘 舖{pou3-2}|to '''open''' a roasted meats shop|C}}
# to [[start]]; to [[turn on]]; to [[switch on]]
#* {{zh-x|開 電燈|to '''switch''' the light '''on'''}}
#* {{zh-x|開 電腦|to '''turn on''' the computer}}
# to [[begin]]; to [[start]]
# to [[boil]]; to [[seethe]]
# to [[write out]] (a prescription, check, invoice, etc.)
#* {{zh-x|開 支票|to '''write''' a check}}
#* {{zh-x|我們 開 了 一 張 學生 必-讀 書-單。|We made a list of required books for students.}}
# to [[book]] (a hotel room)
# to [[operate]]; to [[drive]] (a vehicle)
#* {{zh-x|開車|to '''drive''' a car}}
# [[apart]]; [[away]]
#* {{zh-x|散開|to separate and strew; to [[scatter]]; to [[disperse]]}}
#* {{zh-x|走開|to move '''out of the way'''}}
#* {{zh-x|坐 開|to sit '''farther away'''|C}}
# {{lb|zh|Cantonese}} {{non-gloss definition|Habitual aspect particle.}}
#* {{zh-x|你 有冇 食 開 啲 乜嘢 藥 㗎？|Are you taking any medication?|C}}
# {{lb|zh|physics}} {{zh-short|開爾文|[[kelvin]]}}
# {{lb|zh|loanword|from {{bor|zh|en|K|notext=1}}}} [[karat]]
# {{surname|lang=zh}}
